articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Personal Letter, Gift, Floral Basket to Former Soviet Minister of Defense
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Personal Letter, Gift, Floral Basket to Former Soviet Minister of Defense
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a personal letter, gift and floral basket to Marshal Dmitri Yazov, former Soviet minister of Defense, on his 90th birthday.
					 They were handed to Yazov on Nov. 8 by General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol who is minister of the People's Armed Forces on a visit to Russia to congratulate his birthday.

articles.title: Russian President Meets DPRK Minister of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Russian President Meets DPRK Minister of People's Armed Forces
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Nov. 8 met General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, who participated in the event for congratulating Marshal Dmitri Yazov, former Soviet minister of Defense, on his 90th birthday.
					 The president had a friendly talk with Hyon Yong Chol.

articles.title: Grand Prix Awarded to DPRK Physical Acrobatics
articles.content:
Grand Prix Awarded to DPRK Physical Acrobatics
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The Wuhan International Acrobatics Festival took place in Wuhan City, China from Nov. 1 to 6.
					 The festival brought together excellent acrobats from 16 countries including the DPRK, Russia, China, Cuba, Germany, Mongolia, Spain, Colombia and Finland.
					
					 Gold crane prize, grand prix of the festival, was conferred on the DPRK physical acrobatics "Swinging and See-saw."
					
					 The chairman of the jury of the festival said:
					
					 Acrobatics of the DPRK win top prizes on acrobatic stages still today when they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un as they did in the past under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The festival provided an opportunity to know well about the fact that the successes made by the DPRK acrobats are the fruition of the idea of the great leaders on literary art and their wise guidance.

articles.title: Algerian President Supports Just Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Algerian President Supports Just Cause of Korean People
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Algeria, presented his credentials to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, Nov. 5.
					 The president said that the bilateral relations are the solid and long-standing ties of friendship and cooperation. He added:
					
					 We will always remember that President Kim Il Sung sincerely supported and encouraged the Algerian people in their national liberation struggle.
					
					 The Korean people registered great success in all fields such as politics, economy and military affairs under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea fathered by the President.
					
					 Algeria and the DPRK have supported and cooperated with each other in not only the bilateral relations but also the international arenas.
					
					 The Algerian people will as ever back and encourage the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: DPRK Player Grabs Two Gold Medals at World Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Player Grabs Two Gold Medals at World Weightlifting Championship
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Om Yun Chol grabbed gold medals at the 2014 World Weightlifting Championship on Nov. 8, retaining twice world title.
					 The championship opened in Kazakhstan. It has brought together 530 ace men and women weightlifters from at least 70 countries including the DPRK and regions.
					
					 Om Yun Chol successfully jerked 168 kg and lifted a total of 296 kg at the 56 kg category event. Gold medals were awarded to him.
					
					 He is a gold medalist of the 30th Olympic Games and the title-holder of the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship.

articles.title: KPA Is Pride of WPK and Korean People: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
KPA Is Pride of WPK and Korean People: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- It is the great pride of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korean people that they have the Korean People's Army (KPA) upholding the idea and leadership of the party with arms in practice and defending the dignity and authority of the party in every way.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK could make a leap forward while racing against the time and Korean-style socialism make a long drive without an inch of deflection thanks to the KPA making miracles in implementing the decisions and orders of the party unconditionally.
					
					 The KPA has loyally upheld the guidance of the leader and successfully fulfilled its duty as the standard-bearer implementing the line and policy of the party at any cost since its foundation on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It is the invincible army that has thoroughly established the leadership system of the supreme commander in the whole army and intensified training the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did on Mt. Paektu, and the powerful military ranks taking the van in making the flames of creating the Korean speed rage in every major worksite for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit the main contents of which are the spirit of defending the leader unto death, the spirit of defying the death to carry out a task given by the party and the heroic self-sacrificing spirit is indeed the powerful force for implementing the idea of the party and defending its policy.
					
					 The fresh speed of Songun Korea dashing ahead like the wind towards the world is being created thanks to the death-defying spirit and heroic self-sacrificing spirit of the KPA knowing not even the slightest reason, pretext and impossibility in realizing the plan of the party.
					
					 The Korean people's mentality grows when they witness the heroic struggle of the KPA and it is the iron truth cherished by them in the gigantic practice that nothing will be impossible if they struggle in the fighting spirit as was displayed by the KPA.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Aim of S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Institute "Charter for Unification"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Aim of S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Institute "Charter for Unification"
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group has gone so impudent as to raise again the issue of instituting the "charter for unification", which had been raised by traitor Lee Myung Bak during his tenure of office, in order to take credit to itself. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a commentary.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have been pushed back and driven into the catastrophic phase as now as a result of 5 years of improper handling of the issue by traitor Lee Myung Bak and 2 years by the present chief executive, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present ruling quarters should be held fully accountable for this.
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet group is seeking to institute what it called the "charter for unification" though it should make an apology before the nation.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a sinister intention to weaken the historical significance of the three charters for national reunification supported by all Koreans and the north-south joint declarations which embody the charters, and to discourage the public at home and abroad from showing concern and support for them.
					
					 This is also a revelation of a black-hearted intention to mislead the public opinion by giving impression that they are interested in the unification issue and spearhead it, cover up their true colors as obstructers to reunification while escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and thus speed up the preparations for realizing "unification under liberal democracy" and give wide publicity to the feat of the chief executive.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the puppet forces aim at the confrontation of social systems between the north and the south and the "unification of social systems".
					
					 The north-south relations will only deteriorate as long as the puppet group resorts to the farce of instituting the criminal "charter for reunification" while dreaming of "unification of social systems".

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- 65 civic and public organizations of south Korea struggling for the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster held a press conference before the building of the "National Assembly" on Nov. 6 at which they declared that they would stage an action demanding the institution of a proper special law, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang.
					 The speakers said that the bereaved families and citizens have so far conducted a sit-in in demand of the institution of a special law for the probe into the truth about the ferry disaster.
					
					 The organizations in a press release called on the people of various circles to probe the truth about the disaster without fail through solidarity activities in the future, too, as they have struggled for the institution of a special law for more than 200 days.
					
					 They will vote down in the next election the politicians obstructive to the probe into the truth, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Demand Resignation of President of University
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Demand Resignation of President of University
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The general student council of Chongju University of south Korea declared that it would conduct a campaign of refusing classes on Nov. 3 in demand of the resignation of the president of the university who caused the management crisis, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang.
					 In August the Ministry of Education included Chongju University in the list of the objects to which restrictions of the financial support by the "government" will be applied, thereby bringing about the serious crisis in the management of the university. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the university was disclosed to have salted away zillion won and its president to have resorted to malpractices such as self-righteous management.
					
					 Students warned the president that they would wage protest in case he does not make a decision to resign until Nov. 2.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Stop Its Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Stop Its Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public a statement on Nov. 5 disclosing the essence of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S.
					 It accused the U.S. of raising again the "human rights issue in the north" to escalate the tension to the extremes.
					
					 Lurking behind this is the U.S. intention to mislead the public opinion over the north by branding it as "a country of evil" and, on its basis, secure the validity of a war against the north, it said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has so far put on fat through ceaseless wars of aggression against other countries. It has resorted to all sorts of vicious acts to invent pretexts for wars.
					
					 Looking back on this, it is clear that the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. is nothing but a declaration of a war against the north as it is designed to justify its war moves.
					
					 The U.S. is trumpeting about "human rights performance" in the north based on lies made by human scum who fled after committing all sorts of crimes in the north.
					
					 The U.S. intensified "human rights" racket will only increase the danger of a war. If a war breaks out again on the Korean Peninsula, that will not be confined to the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should stop paying lip-service to peace and halt the foolish "human rights" racket against the north.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Koreans in Germany
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany posted on its website on Oct. 31.
					 The article highly praised Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, as a great master of independent politics.
					
					 His political philosophy is the Juche idea which the international community recognizes as the guiding idea of the cause of independence, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il thoroughly applied in the revolution and construction the Juche idea which has it that man is the master of his own destiny and has the might to pave his own destiny.
					
					 Songun politics is the most important one of his exploits.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics the north remarkably increased its military capabilities and demonstrated its might as a military power no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The sovereignty and socialism in the north have been reliably defended despite the general offensive by the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to building a new independent world, consistently maintaining independence, peace and friendship as the basic ideas of external activities.
					
					 He conducted positive external activities to strengthen the world independent forces against imperialism.
					
					 The might and vitality of his independent politics found their vivid manifestations in the fact that the north and the south ushered in the June 15 era of reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who led the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence to victory only will always remain in the world history of politics as a great master of independent politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- A Libyan committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 3rd anniversary of his demise was formed in Tarabulus on Nov. 5.
					 The general director of the Sunbula International Friendship Club who doubles as chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the remembrance period from Nov. 5 to Dec. 17 and decided to publish Kim Jong Il's works and organize political and cultural events praising his noble career and exploits during the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- A Swiss committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 3rd anniversary of his demise posted an article on its website on Nov. 1 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the publication of his work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il published his famous work "Socialism Is a Science" on the 1st of November, Juche 83 (1994).
					
					 By publishing the work, he dealt a heavy blow to the imperialists trumpeting about the reactionary theory of "the end of socialism" after socialism collapsed in the Soviet Union and Eastern European countries, it noted.
					
					 It carried the detailed gist of the work and continued:
					
					 The work serves as the guidelines and compass to be adhered to by the genuine revolutionaries in the world for the reconstruction of socialism.
					
					 The work is enriching the treasure house of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The progressives are praising this historic work as "the Communist Manifesto for the times" and Kim Jong Il as a prominent thinker and theoretician and the great leader of the world socialist movement.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Military Nexus Slammed by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Military Nexus Slammed by British Organizations
Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Oct. 30 in protest against the U.S.-south Korean authorities' agreement on the indefinite extension of the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control (OPECON).
					 Some days ago, there took place the 46th U.S.-south Korea annual security consultative meeting in Washington in which an agreement was made to indefinitely postpone the OPECON which had been due by 2015, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This agreement amounts to abandoning the sovereignty, and evidently shows that south Korea is nothing but a colony under the control and domination by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's call for taking a resolute action against the agreement.
					
					 The peace-loving progressives all over the world should send support to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the national sovereignty and achieve complete independence.
